about_the_game:
Devexus feasts on your sanity as you guide your Vessel through ludic rituals demonically designed to test your resolve.

Each page of this enigmatic occult grimoire contains powerful knowledge not fit for this world, yet can be yours if the book judges you worthy. Complete the rituals to gain the infernal knowledge of the demons within. Fail, and you will find out what horrors await those unworthy of the Sacramentum Devexus infernal knowledge...

Devexus is a fusion of puzzles and patience. You can solve the puzzles - but can you carefully guide your Vessel to the exit alter? The tight, physics-based controls reward patience and punish carelessness.

Your journey through Devexus will have you:
  • carefully guide your fragile Vessel through macabre mechanical mazes and terrifying traps
  • use innovative physics-based movement mechanics to move around each level
  • lose your sanity over the course of 100+ puzzles
  • unravel the lore behind your mysterious guide

What are you waiting for? Open the cover of the Sacramentum Devexus to begin your unholy journey. There's nothing to be afraid of. Promise...
